description: Betsey Stevenson and Justin Wolfers, both professors of economics and public policy at the University of Michigan, discuss White House economic adviser Larry Kudlow's claim that the economy will bounce back on it's own.
content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.

author: Paul LeBlanc, CNN
title: Trump postpones first pitch at New York Yankees game
description: President Donald Trump said Sunday he's postponed his plan to throw out the opening pitch at a New York Yankees game next month, extending his run as the only modern president to not take part in the longstanding tradition.

author: Devan Cole, CNN
title: Clyburn to offer measure renaming voting rights bill after John Lewis
description: House Majority Whip Jim Clyburn will offer legislation Monday to rename a House-passed voting rights bill after the late Rep. John Lewis, who was brutalized in the 1960s during efforts to secure voting rights for African Americans.

author: Alec Snyder and Alicia Lee, CNN
title: Actress Spencer Grammer injured after trying to break up altercation, NYPD police source says
description: Actress Spencer Grammer was injured in New York City while trying to break up an altercation, a police source told CNN on Sunday.
